content.detailedDescription: I watch the stars nightly during good weather and noticed a very bright light larger than a satellite right above me heading in a southeast direction from the northwest. all of a sudden another smaller light appeared to the northeast and headed toward the first one. a bright ray of some sort came from the second ufo and hit the first one. there was a very bright light and the first ufo disappeared. the second ufo returned on it's original path back from the northeast.
content.summary: First ufo heading southeast, intercepted by second heading southwest and shot down by same. second ufo headed back to northeast

content.detailedDescription:
I was at out kitchen table facing east looking out the window when a bright white light appeared in the eastern sky. i went outside to see if it was a plane of helicopter.
it made absolutely no sound and the light/sphere just hovered over the filed next to our house.
my mother and her friend came outside as well and witnessed the same thing.
we could not figure out what is was. as i said it looked like a light from a helicopter but made now sound. the event lasted about 10 minutes then as suddenly as it appeared it was gone.
content.summary: The bright white object hovered over the field next to my house made no sound.

content.detailedDescription: As i walked my nieghborhood with my baby girls on dec2nd 2013 i came upon a strange looking cloud or smoke over some houses just down street from me as i walked past looking up at it i notice a whistling sound i saw a cloud spinning so i began to walk fast because this thing looked spooky i hurried my babyz to house because this thing was really close to the ground once i got to my parking lot i turned back an notice that it was still there so i walked around the block again once i got to area i had my camera ready as i got closer i started snapping pix an my goodness this thing started moving an the figures in it started to move around i notice that they looked right at me take pix then began to take off my pix show exactly how this thing swiftly move away you can clearly see a skull shape ship the smoke/clouds left a trail after looking a lil closer at pix i discovered some vary interesting things like eyes from a cat/lion appearing out of smoke a profile face an symble ontop of some sort an planet inside the spinning smoke/cloud an angel the figures seem to be looking down one has something in its hands there is an eye on the bottom of this an it appears to have an exhaust system please take a look blow up magnify test pix please these are 1000% real my video shows some smoke/clouds disappearing an reappearing in same spot also the trail it left an some strange things happening to the sky i showed over 2000+people an each 1 that can make out things agree that i've cought something vary extradonry an vary rare i've had cops firemen army soilders an regular people all say they see what i see an show lets see if you guys see them an other stuff don't cover up or mislead or just put this off all these other pix i've seen that are far away or distorted  i've seen that don't look nearly as clear or revealing as mine these pix will deffinently shed some light on some of your studies ive even been told that ive got a war between good an bad an that the gaurdians of heaven are in my pix you take a look for you self an see. take good look at pix the 1 with arrows an the 1 without an magnify blow up you'll be amazed. this happening took place to me for bout 45mins maybe an hr or longer i notice it  then after i'm snapping pix they took off.
content.summary: Smoke or cloud bout 200/300 feet long bout 150 feet in the air this thing had a cockpit with figures inside it the front part there was a spinning gyro green an reddish you i can also see thru the sky inside what look like a hole i seen a planet.

content.detailedDescription: I have observed this object twice now on 8/15/14 and 8/17/14.  it ascends from the west rapidly as a diffused blue light.  it initially appears like a spotlight whose beam is diffusing on a cloud.  there were no clouds in the sky both nights.  very clear conditions.  the light moved across the shy rapidly. the first night it flew upwards and downwards at rapidly then. disappred.  the second night the light ascended higher and made its way east towards my location.  as it did it went from a diffused light ito a very well defined orb.  it hovered and pulsated a very brilliant bluefish light.  after 10 seconds or so it began moving west again at a high rate of speed.  it's path came near a commercial airliner to the west at which time it turned away from it and diffused itself as though it was hiding.  it skirted around the planes vicinity then proceeded a little north then again decended from my view from the same place it appeared.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A brilliant blue orb

content.detailedDescription:
It was just after 9 pm and i was doing some laundry. i went outside to my deck to grab a pool towel that had been left outside the day before so i could wash it. as i walked outside i noticed three lights in the corner of my eye. initially i had thought that i was simply seeing orion's belt as it was a very clear night and the formation the lights were initially in was a very similar looking pattern. as i turned my head toward the lights however, i quickly realized that i wasn't looking at stars at all. the three red lights were much brighter and much larger than any stars in the sky. then, i thought that maybe they were flares of some sort, but they were steady and unwavering as i would expect from a flare and i couldn't see any smoke or chute attached. at this point they started moving across the sky. as they moved they also changed formation a bit. they started as close to a line formation but as they moved the middle one moved below (relative to my perspective) the west most light. they were shaped as more of a triangle at this point. they traveled towards they edge oft field of vision and then stopped once again. they were present for about 10 to 15 seconds longer and then one by one began to get smaller as though they were heading away from me and then disappeared from sight all together. 

i really just want to know if anyone else saw anything that night. it seems unlikely that i could be the only one outside to witness lights as bright as these were.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three bright red lights above the tree line. they moved together and changed formation. they disappeared one at a time diminishing in size before fading away from sight.

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting rome with my girlfriend and we were having a break in piazza del campidoglio, and i was taking pictures to kill the time. i did not notice the object at that time, but only after the post processing of the image. i noticed a weird object in the sky with a funny conical shape. unfortunately the object looks very far and i didn't notice it, otherwise i would have zoomed more to check what it was.
content.summary: Unknown flying object in a clear sky of rome

content.detailedDescription: Right at 2 am i was looking north & an object came with the speed like it was a comet or meteor & proceeded to head south...It looked like a space ship came from space really fast entered our atmosphere & slowed down a bit & kept heading south & disappeared...It was way faster than any satellite i've ever seen or the space station but not as fast as a shooting star..It had to be a space ship or i witnessed a comet
content.summary: Star comet like object from north to south over south east washington

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the freeway and i looked up. it was almost 3 in the morning and i first thought it was a plane but the closer i got i know that it wasn't. it hovered back and forth for 30 minutes. i got it on film. it was just above the trees and it seemed to spray something on me. when i felt water on me i freaked out and left. i took videos but my iphone sucks at 2:45 in the morning. what the heck was anything hovering over freeways at 2:45 saturday morning? i am very puzzled at this. for the video just email me at [email removed/cms/tg] or add me on facebook @ [facebook page name moved to fi section/cms/tg] - i would put the video up now but its on my phone and i'm typing this at my brothers house. i'm not at home.
content.summary: Big as 4 semis all the way around, grey in color

content.detailedDescription: Girlfriend and i were watching tv when our room mate called us outside. he said he sees a ufo.We ran out, i was thinking it was probably a plane but then i saw it. it was high up on the clouds in the same vicinity for about 6 minutes just dashing around and flashing.  after another couple of minutes a couple of helicopters were in the area. at one point it descended and ascended to its original position. it would move behind and in front of the clouds.  eventually it was out of view so we ran to the front of the complex to see if we could see it. we did, this time there were 6 helicopters bellow it's area. i was shocked when i saw it lower right next to the helicopters! it was then i could tell it was less than a mile away because there was a downtown building behind it. the entire time lightning seemed to be the strongest around the craft... we took video and it will be posted on the internet soon. we're trying to increase the clarity since it was so dark and we took it with our smart phones.
content.summary: Flashing light with erratic movement toward down town phoenix

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking south on stone oak parkway in san antonio texas 78258 at approximately 9:30 pm having just crossed arrow hill road/intersection when i looked across the street to the east and noticed an extremely pure brilliant white light in the sky.  my first thought was that the lights were extremely bright for a passenger plane.  i immediately realized that the object was not a plane because of its size and speed and the shape of the object.  this object was flying slightly east of highway 281 north in the direction of randolph air force base.  i realized that the object was not a plane because it had no sound and the brilliant white lights remained as this object continued southward and out of site.  because the speed of the object was so fast i decided to count until it was out of my sight.  all and all i witnessed the object for about 15 seconds however from the time it was directly in line with me to the time it was out of my sight was roughly eight seconds.

i have drawn a picture and attached it below of the object i witnessed in the sky.  logically i know i should not be so confident about the shape and size of the object because the object was against the night sky and the display of brilliantly bright white lights which went around the object should have concealed the object.  regardless i was able to clearly make out the shape of the object.

just as the object left my sight a passenger plane approached the standard downwind leg on its approach to the san antonio airport.  there is no doubt in my mind that the pilots would have seen this object in the night sky due to how bright the object was, and the speed in which it was traveling. another reason i believe they would have seen this object is because it flew directly through the passenger plane downwind flight path from the north to the south and the passenger plane was only 10 seconds away from the point of where i first had seen the object to when the passenger plane flew through the objects path at roughly the same altitude of the object.

the object i witnessed did not flash or change colors in any way.  for the most part the exterior lights remained constant however on two occasions it appeared as if the lights strobed around the object twice in the time i witnessed it in the sky.
content.summary: Extremely large white light object in the night sky over san antonio texas at 9:30 pm

content.detailedDescription: I was at work @10pm east on august 13 2014. i looked to the horizon north and saw a glowing red object. i didn't think much of it at first because there were other planes flying. however as the object got closer it's shape was undefined. by that i mean it didn't look like a plane at all. it looked like a flying cylinder of fire. red and orange in color and moving at a similar speed as the planes in the area. it stayed on course moving south east for @ 2 minutes before disappearing. not behind a tree or building or behind a cloud but just gone. it's size remained fairly constant so i don't think it got out of sight, but it was night and i was in a small valley. another person witnessed this and i have a short video.
content.summary: Glow/burning cylinder moving at rec plane speed. 2 mins

content.detailedDescription:
Shortly after 6 am (approximately 6:10) on the morning of august 18th, 2014, i was traveling west on w bertrand road in niles, mi. i had just gone through the intersection where bertrand intersects portage road. on this section of bertrand, there are large soybean fields on either side of the road. the fields are level and there are no trees at all for the length of the fields. the soybean fields start approximately two-tenths of a mile after the portage road intersection and extend for approximately eight-tenths of a mile. the soybean fields end at mayflower road (south off of bertrand, just before the bridge that carries bertrand over the u.S. 31 bypass).

when i was approximately one-half mile from mayflower road, i saw a pulsing blue light that appeared to be situated at road level on mayflower. my first thought was that the light was a police car that had pulled someone over on mayflower. the light was a very deep blue, but was very bright. it was flashing on and off about once per second. the trees on the west side of mayflower were being illuminated by the flashing light. a couple of seconds after first seeing the light, the light suddenly started to move within a small area. it moved upwards slightly (still lower than the height of the trees next to mayflower) and then it moved to the left a bit. it suddenly took off at a high rate of speed, traveling east along bertrand (towards me). the light was traveling over the soybean field on the south side of bertrand. the light was approximately thirty to forty feet above the field and was roughly the same distance from the edge of bertrand road. as it passed my car, i was amazed at how fast it was moving. it zipped east along the south side of bertrand and came to rest near a stand of trees at the east end of the soybean field on the north side of bertrand. the light traveled the entire distance of the soybean fields (eight-tenths of a mile) in approximately three seconds. (i’ve calculated the speed of the moving light and, even using a conservative estimate of five seconds, the speed of the blue light was over 580 miles per hour).

all the windows on my car were closed and i was listening to a talk program on the radio. i heard no sound whatsoever from the light as it passed me.

as i said, it was very dark outside, but the light did not appear to be mounted on any type of vehicle. it was simply a globe of blue light. although i didn’t have much information to judge the size of the light, it gave the impression of being roughly the size of a basketball.

my biggest regret is that i then chose to continue on to work (so i wouldn’t be late for a 7 o’clock meeting) instead of turning around to investigate the light which was still pulsing and illuminating the trees at the east end of the field. i assumed that it would be gone by the time i got to it and i didn’t want to be late. wrong choice - next time, i’ll choose to be late!
content.summary: Blue orb moving at high rate of speed at thirty feet above ground

content.detailedDescription: My associate and i were at work (security guards) having a cigarette, when we both looked for no apparent reason up in the sky to the same place, at first i thought we were looking at orion's belt, but then one of the objects started moving "up" towards the brightest dot, a second or two later the others apart from the brightest one started moving as well in the same direction. the first object split in two that moved parallel then the "new" object took a left turn, and the "lower" two that originally travelled after the original object fallowed after it. all four objects then appear to rise up from sight until we manage to block a little of the ambient light an get a better look at the sky. all the items are moving erraticly, until they disappear all to gather.
content.summary: First 3 then 4 points in the sky, moved around in a line then changed direction.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Monday august 18, 2014 rainbow city al
i was outside on the phone with mom. i looked off to the east towards gadsden at the mountain that has antennas at the top. i saw a black orb like thing floating up towards the south. i thought it was a ballon but it was too big for as far away as it was. as it flew it went from the orb shape to a flat shape. it was slower then a plane but was fast like a helicopter searching for something. it began to hover over something in a south east direction. after a few minutes it cut back towards the north about half way from where it originated. it hovered there for a few minutes then began to go into the cloud cover as there is a storm blowing through. it took about 5-10 minutes for it to completely disappear. the whole time it didn't shrink. it flew in straight and diagonal lines and seemed curious. i wouldn't say the flight path was precise but it wasn't an accident. it seemed to flow. and it almost appeared as it was spinning. not in a clockwise pattern but end over end because of how it flattened as it flew.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It floated up hovered, went diagonally up hovered, went back towards origin then absorbed onto clouds

content.detailedDescription: We were driving back out of old town cottonwood after dinner, toward the roundabout at the very end of sr89a, this road goes up to jerome, az. as we approached the roundabout, we noticed a huge formation that was taking place to the south... at that time it looked like a tornado. i was in awe of it so i started to take pics with my cell phone,  however it was dark out and i didn't know if they would come out. when i took the photo, i did not notice the lights right away. after looking at the photos, i saw these lights that looked like the were at the very bottom of the formation, in a huge row, the lights were uniform. i zoomed in and it just blew my mind. i would like to submit my photos for your testing to see what exactly they were. i took two photos.
content.summary: Thought what looked like a tornado, strange cloud formation, so i took photos and saw the lights

content.detailedDescription: I was on a camping trip with 3 other family members on mt. st. helens on august 16th, 2014 when we decided to look at the stars in an empty parking lot. the sky was perfectly clear without a cloud in sight. we were just looking around trying to pick out constellations when i saw something that looked like a star, but wasn't a star at around 11:00 pm. from where i was looking, it was positioned fairly close to the top of the mountain (it was in the north part of the sky). it wasn't moving like most ufo sightings, but it wasn't completely still like all the other stars. it looked like it was hovering and it kind of flashed a reddish/greenish color. we had forgotten to bring our telescope that night so it was hard to figure out what it was. we gave up on it and went back to our campsite. the next night, on august 17th, 2014, we went to the same spot again and brought the telescope. the sky was just as clear as the night before. i tried to find the object again so i could use the telescope on it, but it wasn't there anymore. i didn't try to look for it, but about half an hour after we had been there, my dad spotted the object again at about 10:00 pm, but it had moved to the west part of the sky. he finally got the telescope on it and what i saw completely blew me away. the object appeared to be several red and green lights, (about 7-10 of them) in the shape of a circle and it was completely black in the middle. they kind of looked like christmas lights, but they were way too high up in the sky to be anything like that. what was really strange about it was the way it moved. the object stayed in place, but the lights on it moved back in forth, almost like an amoeba. the object continued to get even more mysterious when we saw another one of the exact same description in the exact opposite direction of the sky (east). they were at the same height and everything. i was unable to get a picture of it since it was so far away that you could only see the detail of it through the telescope. it looked like a slightly colored star to the naked eye.
content.summary: Two multi colored  circular, hovering objects in the directions of west and east.

content.detailedDescription: The other night around 1 in the morning i saw what was a black kinda triangle type craft that made no noise and was very spooky i kinda wonder if it came from jblm airforce base because what i seen didn't look like a passenger type craft. it came from south to the nw side of sky and was gone.
content.summary: Saw a triangle

content.detailedDescription: We were in washington,nh approximately 10 miles up lempster mountain. we were sitting out on the deck, it was after 9 pm. there were no outside lights on(only the inside kitchen light and 2 tea lights on our tables). we were talking about how clear and quiet it is up there(not from nh), no street lights, no traffic, no neighbors close by (city vs country)and how great the stars looked. so we were talking and watching the sky to see if one of us (4 of us at this time) could see a shooting star. one of us noticed an orange/red orb in the southeast sky. we all watched, thought it might be a meteor, but it didn't seem to be moving. then after several seconds we realized it was moving. it was heading north and as came within a more easterly view we could see that there were 2 orange/red lights. the front light was bigger and seemed more luminous than the smaller light in the back (both were very bright). the lights were connected by a dull dark shape (unknown)in the middle. we called 3 other people out of the house to see this, now there are 7 of us watching these lights flying slowly and silently across the sky (high up and never changed altitude). before the lights were out of our view (behind the tree line) i took 1 picture (sending this picture)on my cell phone (not a smartphone). the whole viewing probably lasted about 3-5 minutes.
content.summary: Myself and six others witnessed an object with orange lights in the front and back. it flew slowly and silently across the night sky over washington or hillsborough  cell phone pic included.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at this tourist site call the morro in old san juan, i was sitting in the grass watching the sunset, when the stars came out i noticed what seems to be a weather ballon ,but about 30 seconds later i notice it completely stop moving it frozed, i thought maybe is a satellite, but my stargazing program indicated was not, so i keep staring at it
seem like it reflected golden light was round shape like a sphere, then out of nowhere, all of the sudden i felt as if i was inside a tunnel as if i was being pulled upwards
i got up and started running towards the exit of the place, in that instance my oldest daughter was coming in to the place to meet me, i told her to walk away from the place with me and later on i explained to her what just occurred to me inside the place i was just in
, she joked as if i was insane...Next morning, there's was news in the internet  and newspaper 100s of people reported seeing ufos in the area i was one person even posted a video of what seem to be a mother ship right in the area where i sat and saw the object
content.summary: At first i thought to be a weather ballon till i realized it wasn't ,it stayed still..Till

content.detailedDescription: Iv observed them 2 nights in a row u need to come see this it blew me and my wifes mind we were like what is that plain as day some blinked a few times then lit up and coasted across the sky and oyhers just lit up and coasted across a couple just slowly dimmed till you couldent see them and others just stayed lit till they went out of view u have to come video these i wpold but don't have a video camera that would do this justice please come and observe these thanks [name removed/cms/rjl].
content.summary: It lit up and looked like a star and just coasted across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the iss live feed and the sun started to rise. there were obviously reflections from the sun as shown in the images, but this one stayed visable after the sun had risen. it seemed to be in low earth orbit just above the cloud line. it obviously was not anything on earth even a cloud because it stayed in the same position as the clouds around it moved. eventually after a few minutes it disappeared under the clouds and the live feed went to blue screen. my conclusion is that it was either space debris, a satellite, or a ufo.
content.summary: Occured while watching the iss live feed. i took several screenshots as well.

content.detailedDescription: I am reporting this for my granddaughter (age 20) and friend observed a cone/shaped light/object while driving west on the 210 freeway, yesterday, august 17, 2014, at approx 7:30pm/dusk.  there was a cone shaped lights/object, blue-green on the bottom of the cone and white on the pointed end of the cone.  as they looked toward the mountains on their right it was located 3/4 of the way up the mountain and descending quickly, in 3-5 seconds it went out of sight.
content.summary: Blue/green cone shaped object with white tail

content.detailedDescription:
About the ufo incident, to make a long story short...

 

ok, without being here in person, it is probably hard to believe, and even harder to explain...

 

while just being on the beach for a walk before going to bed, we 1st noticed a very bright light 

 

on the horizon to the north, at 1st we thought it was a fishing boat way, way out, (if you are on the

 

beach at the ocean, or on a boat you can see approximately 30 miles) out into the ocean, before

 

 the curvature of the earth takes over, then you are just looking out into space over the horizon,

 

so anyways, this light kept on getting closer & closer then i could tell that it was not on the water

 

but up in the sky, so then i thought it was a coast guard helicopter but it was moving to fast about 

 

the same speed as a jet at 30,000 feet' then as it kept on getting closer, i thought it was the  (iss) 

 

(international space station) so finally i could tell that it was at least as high as that, 30,000 feet, 

 

and very bright, as it came right out in front of us, i'd say approximately 5 to 10 miles out and way 

 

up in the sky, it then looked just like a super 'big' bright star, then it completely stopped dead in it's

 

tracts and just stayed there jerking around a little bit for about 10 minutes, then after the ten minutes,

 

3 other tiny small red dots appeared from nowhere, one right after the other about as far away as you

 

can hold your thumb & index finger apart from this ufo, they headed right to it, then they were gone.

 

then about 2-3 minutes later the big bright light just vanished, poof it was gone. it didn't speed off in

 

any direction, or go straight up or down it just simply vanished... it was kind of cool, but spooky too!

 

good night my dear,
content.summary: See the detailed description below

content.detailedDescription:
Ese día fui a recoger a mi novia al trabajo, mientras la esperaba sentado en el coche decidí echar un poco el asiento hacia atrás, al estar echado en el asiento del conductor solo veía el cielo, todavía era de día, entonces vi un punto de luz muy lejos, seguía una trayectoria mas o menos horizontal, hasta ahí no pense nada raro...Ya que iba muy despacio y pensaba que se trataba de un avión...Me quede mirando ese punto de luz..Y cambio bruscamente de dirección hacia el lado contrario al que iba pero esta vez ascendiendo. me di cuenta de que eso no lo hace ningún avión que conozca y me puse muy nervioso. todo duro duro menos de 10 segundos. al poco llegó mi novia y me pregunto que me pasaba que porque estaba tan pálido.

viendo un documental en el canal de historia pusieron un video exactamente igual a lo que yo vi y decidí ponerlo aquí.
content.summary: Punto de luz, que sigue una trayectoria recta y cambia bruscamente de direccion hacia el lado opuesto al que se dirigia.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on my balcony and looking at the sky and then i saw something silver in the sky flying a z path and then the jas planes came and hunting it then i saw in the distant a silent explosion in the sky like someone flashing their flashlight fast and then the helis came flying and the hercules heavy transport planes flying low near the ground and they flyed around for abut 3 hour and 40 sek and then they all just flyed away. 

and no one wants to talk about it even if they saw the same as me, they are afraid of something.

me and my mother saw it on the balcony 

and the date i don't remember the date so well.

(sorry for my bad english)
content.summary: It was hunted by jas planes.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work about 30 miles southeast of ouray , utah, and i noticed in the sky just above the horizon to the northeast of me about a quarter mile away a large black object changing shape.
it was changing from a sphere to a birdlike object to a pole like object just to name a few of the shapes.
i grabbed my phone and took a couple pictures but it seems a little too far away to see good.
i continued watching it changing shapes and then the object went into hundreds of little spheres and just dissipated and scattered in all directions.
on august 16th in the same area as the sun was coming up i observed a black cigar shaped object traveling from the west to the east, it was much lower than the clouds and when the sun hit it , it was a very bright silvery object.
i work in the area every day and i'm sure if you were in the same area you could see some very strange things also.
thank you,
worker in northeast utah.
content.summary: Early in the morning around august 2nd i observed a large black object above the ground in the sky, it was not moving.

content.detailedDescription: My self and my ranch hand were traveling from oregon to nampa idaho, my ranch hand was driving. it was approximately 7:30-8 pm. there was a huge thunderhead, i was taking pictures of ther chemtrailers spraying and building the thunderhead. when i later reviewed the photos i discovered the white lights in sometimes "v" formation, and the presence of....I don't know, that shadow that appears in conjunction with the lights. i have several other photos of "odd" things in the sky separate from this particular event. last february, i was driving throught nevada  headed for nationals in phoenix az, 20 miles below tonapah nv, i was driving 75 mph, pick up truck, 4 horse living quarters big traier. a craft appeared on the left hand side of the pickup, less the 300ft  away, pacing us at 75mph. all three of us saw the event. the craft had three huge yellow red circles that began pulsating in an irratic manner, the craft then rotated light side down which revealed a triangle shape, where it then shot straight up and disappeared.  we was over 20 craft that evening.   how did it make us feel, me excited, my companions were a bit freaked out. the craft made no noise. i know we are not alone here, just want to know if you know what these photos represent. these photos were taken through a dirty front windshield, but those are not bugs. thank you for your time.  i have more photos taken consecutively , but there is not enough room.
content.summary: Driving to nampa horse show from oregon, taking photos of chemtrailers building thunderheads. did not see the lights in v form or...Whatever that other shadow is with eye. caught this when i looked at photos later

content.detailedDescription:
The witness was backing north out of his mother's driveway when he saw a red-orange orb to the east of his location.  traveling to the west he and his nephew, who was riding in a jeep with him, watched the object continue to the northwest at a height of about 300'.  while observing, the witness who was driving, got a call from his brother.  his brother and another nephew had spotted the object from the mother's house.  the object disappeared behind some trees so the witnesses in the jeep went to an open area where they thought it might have landed.  when they got there the object had disappeared.  the driver/main witness, estimated the speed of the object at 100 mph. the driver's brother confirmed the speed and elevation.  the observation took place about three miles from rockwell international.  the only air traffic was about five miles away.  the observation lasted for about one minute.  the witness has made multiple reports to mufon of sightings around the cedar rapids area.

note: the total number of witnesses(4)does not include the field investigator who filed this report.
content.summary: Four witnesses observe red orb three miles from rockwell international.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night i was talking to a friend who was in the bathroom as i decided to close the blinds in my bedroom as i began to close the second blind still in conversation with my friend i happened to take a closer look out the window and saw a grey being standing right up by the window about 5ft tall lets say i was in complete shock which made my friend come out of bathroom. i didnt wanna tell him at first due to fear of judgement which he did ask if i was serious and he didnt beleieve me.

needless to say i am very in tune with my surroundings and have heard things around me before but ive never been face to face with an entity before. it didnt appear that my reaction even affected his posture or stance what so ever. it appeared almost robotic and i didnt get any sense of emotion of this creature very cold and calculated. now im just more worried for my safety as i see myself as a speical person on this place that effects many people i fome into connect with an in fear of my safety. please take this very seriously i have not told anyone besides the friend who thinks im crazy.
content.summary: Was talking to a friend who was in the bathroom when i walked into my room to close my blinds of my window. as i closed the second one i happened to look more closely and saw about a 5ft grey being standin there that looked similar to the grel

content.detailedDescription: We were on top deck of vacation house ocean front. (my wife and i had seen orange orbs in charlotte nc on 9/16/2011 and i reported those to mufon as well). just before lights appeared i said a silent prayer asking to see them again so that my step-son might see and believe. my belief that there is more angel than alien to them was confirmed when a minute after silent prayer three orange orbs lit up one at a time just above horizon over ocean. i immediately pointed and said "look!". my wife and step-son were present and saw them. it was night and they were parallel to the horizon. these lights faded and 5 more lights lit up one at a time perfectly perpendicular to the previous 3. they lit up starting at bottom to top with the last light slightly to the right of the vertical line of the other 4 lights. best estimate of total height vertical lights covered comparable to a 20 / 30 story building but since it was over ocean could be as tall as a mile. in total the lights would create an upside down capital letter "t" with the one additional light at top to right. as quickly as they appeared they faded out in the same order. there was no movement. just as the sighting that occurred in 2011 the enormous coincidence of talking about them and then the lights showing up have compelled me to report this sighting.
content.summary: Orange orbs - stationary, lit up and turned off in unusual pattern
